articles.description: The 29-year-old actress opens up to The Hollywood Reporter about landing the help of Quincy Jones, dancing with mother-in-law Victoria Beckham at the premiere of 'Lola' and strategizing how to cast her actor brother Will Peltz.
articles.content: Nicola Peltz Beckham started acting at age 12 but it wasn’t until three years later that she started working with acting coach Nancy Banks. She still relies on Banks to guide performances to this day… [+14037 chars]
